Articles.Content: Are there any mods out there that simply add more unique descriptions for doing certain kinds of science, crew reports and EVA reports in all the biomes around the planets and areas in space? I find them quite funny rewarding when I obtain them, but I'm a bit sad that so many of them seem to be copies of the same text. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
